snippet.title: Splosion Man Official Trailer
snippet.description: Fools they were, to tread where knowledge should stay forbidden. For what emerged was not a man, it was Splosion Man. "And all who saw him were sploded, for he was the fire and they were but meat." Able to splode himself at will, Splosion Man launches his way through 100 levels of single-player and 4-player co-op, an uncontainable force.
